    • Method Detail

      • basicSearchProducts

        public java.util.ArrayList<Product> basicSearchProducts(java.lang.String query,
                                                        java.lang.String orderBy,
                                                        boolean asc)
                                                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        Search products in the database based on the name and the given options. If alpha is not one of the correct options, it orders by name by default.
        Parameters:
        query - The query executed in the database.
        orderBY - Must be 'price' or 'alpha'
        asc - If true, orders ASCENDANT else orders DESCENDENT.
        Returns:
        A list of products.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getCustomerInfo

        public Customer getCustomerInfo(int userID)
                         throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns the information of a customer based on his user id.
        Parameters:
        userID - The user id in the database.
        Returns:
        All the information of the user stored in the database.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

        Returns:

      • login

        public int login(java.lang.String mailAddress,
                 java.lang.String password)
          throws java.sql.SQLException
        Check the username and password into the Customers table.
        Parameters:
        username - Customer username.
        password - Customer password.
        Returns:

      • searchStockByID

        public int searchStockByID(int productID)
                    throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns the stock of a given product.
        Parameters:
        productID - The id of the product.
        Returns:
        the number of items of the product.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if no product with that productID is found

      • userType

        public java.lang.String userType(int customerID)
        Returns the type of a customer.
        Parameters:
        customerID - The id of the searched customer.
        Returns:
        "user" if its a normal user. "admin" if its a super user.
